tool.name: bedtools BED to IGV
tool.description: create batch script for taking IGV screenshots

param.name: input
param.label: Create IGV batch script for this @STD_BEDTOOLS_INPUT_LABEL@ file

param.name: sort
param.label: Sort BAM file by
param.help: The type of BAM sorting you would like to apply to each image.

param.name: clps
param.label: Collapse the aligned reads prior to taking a snapshot?

param.name: name
param.label: Use the name field (column 4) for each image's filename.

param.name: slop
param.label: Number of flanking base pairs on the left and right of the image.

param.name: img
param.label: Select the type of image to be created.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Creates a batch script to create IGV images at each interval defined in a @STD_BEDTOOLS_INPUT_LABEL@ file.
**Notes**
(1) The resulting script is meant to be run from within IGV. (2) It is assumed that prior to running the script, you've loaded the proper genome and tracks.
@REFERENCES@
